verses.verse: And Isaac <S%H3327><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%>, and blessed <S%H1288><s%> him <S%H6680><s%>, and charged him <S%H559><s%>, and said unto him <S%H3947><s%>, Thou shalt not take a wife <S%H802><s%> of the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>.

Arise <S%H6965><s%>, go <S%H3212><s%> to Paddan-aram <S%H6307><s%>, to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Bethuel <S%H1328><s%> thy mother <S%H517><s%>'s father <S%H1><s%>; and take <S%H3947><s%> thee a wife <S%H802><s%> from thence of the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Laban <S%H3837><s%> thy mother <S%H517><s%>'s brother <S%H251><s%>.

And God <S%H410><s%> Almighty <S%H7706><s%> bless <S%H1288><s%> thee <S%H6509><s%>, and make thee fruitful, and multiply <S%H7235><s%> thee <S%H6951><s%>, that thou mayest be a company of peoples <S%H5971><s%>;

and give <S%H5414><s%> thee the blessing <S%H1293><s%> of Abraham <S%H85><s%>, to thee <S%H2233><s%>, and to thy seed with thee <S%H3423><s%>; that thou mayest inherit the land <S%H776><s%> of thy sojournings <S%H4033><s%>, which God <S%H430><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> unto Abraham <S%H85><s%>.

And Isaac <S%H3327><s%> sent away <S%H7971><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%>: and he went <S%H3212><s%> to Paddan-aram <S%H6307><s%> unto Laban <S%H3837><s%>, son <S%H1121><s%> of Bethuel <S%H1328><s%> the Syrian <S%H761><s%>, the brother <S%H251><s%> of Rebekah <S%H7259><s%>, Jacob <S%H3290><s%>'s and Esau <S%H6215><s%>'s mother <S%H517><s%>.

Now Esau <S%H6215><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that Isaac <S%H3327><s%> had blessed <S%H1288><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> and sent him away <S%H7971><s%> to Paddan-aram <S%H6307><s%>, to take <S%H3947><s%> him a wife <S%H802><s%> from thence <S%H1288><s%>; and that as he blessed him he gave him a charge <S%H6680><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Thou shalt not take <S%H3947><s%> a wife <S%H802><s%> of the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>;
and that Jacob <S%H3290><s%> obeyed <S%H8085><s%> his father <S%H1><s%> and his mother <S%H517><s%>, and was gone <S%H3212><s%> to Paddan-aram <S%H6307><s%>:
and Esau <S%H6215><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%> pleased <S%H5869><s%> not <S%H7451><s%> Isaac <S%H3327><s%> his father <S%H1><s%>;

and Esau <S%H6215><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> unto Ishmael <S%H3458><s%>, and took <S%H3947><s%>, besides the wives <S%H802><s%> that he had <S%H4258><s%>, Mahalath the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Ishmael <S%H3458><s%> Abraham <S%H85><s%>'s son <S%H1121><s%>, the sister <S%H269><s%> of Nebaioth <S%H5032><s%>, to be his wife <S%H802><s%>.
And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> from Beer-sheba <S%H884><s%>, and went <S%H3212><s%> toward Haran <S%H2771><s%>.

And he lighted <S%H6293><s%> upon a certain place <S%H4725><s%>, and tarried there all night <S%H3885><s%>, because the sun <S%H8121><s%> was set <S%H935><s%>; and he took <S%H3947><s%> one of the stones <S%H68><s%> of the place <S%H4725><s%>, and put <S%H7760><s%> it under his head <S%H4763><s%>, and lay down <S%H7901><s%> in that place <S%H4725><s%> to sleep <S%H7901><s%>.

And he dreamed <S%H2492><s%>; and behold <S%H5551><s%>, a ladder set up <S%H5324><s%> on the earth <S%H776><s%>, and the top of it <S%H7218><s%> reached <S%H5060><s%> to heaven <S%H8064><s%>; and <S%H4397><s%>, behold, the angels of God <S%H430><s%> ascending <S%H5927><s%> and descending on it <S%H3381><s%>.

And <S%H3068><s%>, behold, Jehovah stood <S%H5324><s%> above it <S%H559><s%>, and said, I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of Abraham <S%H85><s%> thy father <S%H1><s%>, and the God <S%H430><s%> of Isaac <S%H3327><s%>: the land <S%H776><s%> whereon thou liest <S%H7901><s%>, to thee will I give it <S%H5414><s%>, and to thy seed <S%H2233><s%>;

and thy seed <S%H2233><s%> shall be as the dust <S%H6083><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>, and thou shalt spread abroad <S%H6555><s%> to the west <S%H3220><s%>, and to the east <S%H6924><s%>, and to the north <S%H6828><s%>, and to the south <S%H5045><s%>: and in thee and in thy seed <S%H2233><s%> shall all the families <S%H4940><s%> of the earth <S%H127><s%> be blessed <S%H1288><s%>.

And <S%H8104><s%>, behold, I am with thee, and will keep thee whithersoever <S%H834><s%> thou goest <S%H3212><s%>, and will bring thee again <S%H7725><s%> into this land <S%H127><s%>; for I will not leave <S%H5800><s%> thee <S%H834><s%>, until I have done <S%H6213><s%> that which I have spoken to thee of <S%H1696><s%>.

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> awaked <S%H3364><s%> out of his sleep <S%H8142><s%>, and he said <S%H559><s%>, Surely <S%H403><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is <S%H3426><s%> in this place <S%H4725><s%>; and I knew it not <S%H3045><s%>.

And he was afraid <S%H3372><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, How dreadful <S%H3372><s%> is this place <S%H4725><s%>! this is none other than the house <S%H1004><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>, and this is the gate <S%H8179><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%>.

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> rose up early <S%H7925><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%>, and took <S%H3947><s%> the stone <S%H68><s%> that he had put <S%H7760><s%> under his head <S%H4763><s%>, and set it up <S%H7760><s%> for a pillar <S%H4676><s%>, and poured <S%H3332><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%> upon the top of it <S%H7218><s%>.

And he called <S%H7121><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of that place <S%H4725><s%> Beth-el <S%H1008><s%>: but <S%H199><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> was Luz <S%H3870><s%> at the first <S%H7223><s%>.

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> vowed <S%H5087><s%> a vow <S%H5088><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, If God <S%H430><s%> will be with me <S%H8104><s%>, and will keep me in this way <S%H1870><s%> that I go <S%H1980><s%>, and will give <S%H5414><s%> me bread <S%H3899><s%> to eat <S%H398><s%>, and raiment <S%H899><s%> to put on <S%H3847><s%>,
so that I come again <S%H7725><s%> to my father <S%H1><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%> in peace <S%H7965><s%>, and Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will be my God <S%H430><s%>,

then this stone <S%H68><s%>, which I have set <S%H7760><s%> up for a pillar <S%H4676><s%>, shall be God <S%H430><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%>: and of all that thou shalt give <S%H5414><s%> me I will surely <S%H6237><s%> give the tenth unto thee <S%H6237><s%>.
